channel.title: Posts on Maria Witek, DPhil
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Maria Witek, DPhil

item.title: Interview in Elemental about music listening for concentration
item.description: Earlier this month, I spoke with a journalist at Elemental (published by Medium), about the extent to which music can help concentration during study and work.

item.title: Upcoming interview on BBC Radio 3
item.description: On May 20th 5pm, I’ll be on BBC Radio 3’s Listening Service talking to Tom Service about why syncopated music makes people want to move. Tune in! If you miss the broadcast, you can also listen to it as a podcast shortly after.
